analyzed: praṇamya paramam jyotiḥ vāmanena kavi priyā
kāvya alaṅkāra sūtrāṇām teṣām vṛttiḥ vidhīyate
sa doṣa guṇa alaṅkāra hāna ādānābhyām

original: sā tridhā --- vaidarbhī gauḍīyā pāñcālī ceti // VKal_1,2.9 //
analyzed: sā tridhā vaidarbhī gauḍīyā pāñcālī ca iti
vidarbha ādiṣu dṛṣṭa tvāt tad samākhyā
tad ārohaṇa artham itara abhyāsaḥ iti eke
tat tu na atattva śīlasya tattva aniṣpatteḥ
na śaṇa sūtra vāna abhyāse trasara sūtra vāna vaicitrya lābhaḥ
sā api samāsa abhāve śuddha vaidarbhī
tad upārohāt artha guṇa leśaḥ pi

original: loko vidyā prakīrṇa ca kāvyāṅgāni // VKal_1,3.1 //

analyzed: śabda smṛti abhidhāna kośa chandaḥ viciti kalā kāmaśāstra daṇḍanīti pūrvāḥ vidyāḥ
iti vṛtta kuṭila tvam ca tatas

original: lakṣyajñatvamabhiyogo vṛddhasevāvekṣaṇaṃ pratibhānamavadhānaṃ ca prakīrṇam // VKal_1,3.11 //
analyzed: lakṣya jña tvam abhiyogaḥ vṛddha sevā avekṣaṇam pratibhānam avadhānam ca prakīrṇam
tatra kāvya paricayaḥ lakṣya jña tvam
kāvya upadeśa guru śuśrūṣaṇam vṛddha sevā
gadyam vṛtta gandhi cūrṇam utkalikā prāyam ca
krama siddhiḥ tayoḥ sraj uttaṃsa vat
na anibaddham cakāsti eka tejaḥ paramāṇu vat
tat hi citram citra paṭavat viśeṣa sākalyāt
samāptam ca idam śārīram prathamam adhikaraṇam

original: duṣṭaṃ padamasādhu kaṣṭaṃ grāmyamapratītamanarthakaṃ ca // VKal_2,1.4 //
analyzed: duṣṭam padam asādhu kaṣṭam grāmyam apratītam anarthakam ca
anya artha neya gūḍha artha aślīla kliṣṭāni ca
a prasiddha artha prayuktam gūḍha artham
asamyak artha antaram asamyak smṛti hetuḥ ca aślīlam
vrīḍā jugupsā maṅgala ātaṅka dāyi bhedāt
bhinna vṛtta yati bhraṣṭa visaṃdhīni vākyāni
sva lakṣaṇa cyuta vṛttam bhinna vṛttam
tad dhātu nāma bhāga bhede svara saṃdhi a kṛte prāyeṇa
na vṛtta doṣāt pṛthak yati dpṣaḥ
pada saṃdheḥ vairūpyam viśleṣaḥ ślīla tvam kaṣṭa tvam ca
vyartha eka artha saṃdigdha ayukta apakrama loka vidyāḥ viruddhāni ca
na viśeṣaḥ ced eka artham duṣṭam
dhanuḥ jyā dhvanau dhanuḥ śrutiḥ ārūḍheḥ pratipattyai
karṇa avataṃsa śravaṇa kuṇḍala śiraḥ śekhareṣu karṇa ādi nirdeśaḥ saṃnidheḥ
muktā hāra śabde muktā śabdaḥ śuddheḥ
puṣpa mālā śabde puṣpa padam utkarṣasya
kari kalabha śabde kari śabdaḥ tādrūpyasya
deśa kāla svabhāva viruddha arthāni loka viruddhāni
kalā caturvarga śāstra viruddha arthāni vidyā viruddhāni
ca idam doṣa darśanam dvitīyam adhikaraṇam
ojaḥ prasāda śleṣa sama tā samādhi mādhurya saukumārya udāra tā artha vyakti kāntayaḥ bandha guṇāḥ
na pṛthak āroha avarohayoḥ ojaḥ prasāda rūpa tvāt
artha vyakti hetu tvam artha vyaktiḥ
a yoniḥ anyat chāyā a yoniḥ vā
vastu svabhāva sphuṭa tvam artha vyaktiḥ
ca idam guṇa vivecanam tṛtīyam adhikaraṇam
padam an aika artham akṣaram ca avṛttam sthāna niyame yamakam
pādāḥ pādasya ekasya anekasya ca ādi madhya anta bhāgāḥ sthānāni
śṛṅkhalā parivartakaḥ cūrṇam iti bhaṅga mārgaḥ
piṇḍa akṣara bhede svarūpa lopaḥ cūrṇam
upamānena upameyasya guṇa leśataḥ sāmyam upamā
guṇa dyotaka upamāna upameya śabdānām sāmagrye pūrṇā
hīna tva adhika tva liṅga vacana bheda asādṛśya asaṃbhavāḥ tad doṣāḥ
jāti pramāṇa dharma nyūna tā upamānasya hīna tvam
upamāna upameyayoḥ liṅga vyatyāsaḥ liṅga bhedaḥ
laukikyām samāsa abhihitāyām upamā prapañce ca
upamāna ādhikyāt tad apohaḥ iti eke
upameyasya uktau samāna vastu nyāsaḥ prativastu
upamānena upameyasya guṇa sāmyāt tattva āropaḥ rūpakam
a tad rūpasya anyathā adhyavasānam atiśaya artham utprekṣā
saṃbhāvya dharma tad utkarṣa kalpanā atiśayoktiḥ
ekasya upameya tva upamāna tve nanvayaḥ
upamāna upameya vākyeṣu ekā kriyā dīpakam
ādi madhya anta vākya vṛtti bhedāt
kriyayā eva sva tad artha anvaya khyāpanam nidarśanam
ukti siddhyai vastunaḥ rtha antarasya eva nyasanam arthāntaranyāsaḥ
saṃbhāvya viśiṣṭa karma akaraṇāt nindā stotra arthā vyāja stutiḥ
viśiṣṭena sāmya artham eka kāla kriyā yogaḥ tulya yogi tā
vastu dvaya kriyayoḥ tulya kālayoḥ eka pada abhidhānam sahoktiḥ
tad bhedau upamā rūpaka utprekṣā avayavau

original: naikaṃ padaṃ dviḥ prayojyaṃ prāyeṇa // VKal_5,1.1 //
analyzed: na ekam padam dvis prayojyam prāyeṇa
nityā saṃhitā eka pada vat pādeṣu ardha anta varjam
na pāda anta laghoḥ guru tvam ca sarvatra
na ga ādye samāpta prāyam vṛttam
stana ādīnām dvi tva āviṣṭā jātiḥ prāyeṇa
mili klabi kṣapi prabhṛtīnām dhātu tvam
labheḥ gati artha tvāt ṇici aṇau kartuḥ karma tva a karma tve
madhu pipāsu prabhṛtīnām samāsaḥ gami gāmi ādiṣu pāṭhāt
bimba adharaḥ iti vṛttau madhyama pada lopinyām
ā mūla lola ādiṣu vṛttiḥ vispaṣṭa paṭu vat
na dhānya ṣaṣṭha ādiṣu ṣaṣṭhī samāsa pratiṣedhaḥ
avarjyaḥ bahuvrīhiḥ vyadhikaraṇaḥ janma ādi uttara padaḥ
hasta agra agra hasta ādayaḥ guṇa guṇinoḥ bheda abhedāt
nipātena api abhihite karmaṇi na karma vibhaktiḥ

original: śakyamiti rūpaṃ karmābhidhāyāṃ liṅgavacanasyāpi sāmānyopakramāt // VKal_5,2.22 //
analyzed: śakyam iti rūpam karma abhidhāyām liṅga vacanasya api sāmānya upakramāt
hāni vat ādhikyam api aṅgānām vikāraḥ
mahīdhra ādayaḥ mūla vibhuja ādi darśanāt
brahma ādiṣu hanteḥ niyamāt ari hā ādi asiddhiḥ
brahma vid ādayaḥ kṛt anta vṛttyā
bhidura ādayaḥ karma kartari kartari ca
avatara apacāya śabdayoḥ dīrgha hrasva tva vyatyāsaḥ bālānām

original: avidhau guroḥ striyāṃ bahulaṃ vivakṣā // VKal_5,2.41 //
analyzed: a vidhau guroḥ striyām bahulam vivakṣā
āha iti bhūte ni a ṇ a l anta bhramāt bruvaḥ laṭi
rāja vaṃśya ādayaḥ sādhu arthe ye bhavanti
muk dhim ādiṣu ivam anic mṛgyaḥ
ṣ y añaḥ ṣ it karaṇa ādi īkāraḥ bahulam
kauśila ādayaḥ i l a ci varṇa lopāt
na sa rajasam iti an avyayībhāve
kṣata dṛḍha ūrsaḥ iti na kap
apāṅga netra iti luk a labhyaḥ
kāmayāna śabdaḥ siddhaḥ na ādiḥ ced
sauhṛda daurhṛda śabdau aṇi hṛd bhāvāt
mandam mandam iti aprakāra artha tve
na aṅguli saṅge iti mūrdhanya vidheḥ
samāptam ca idam prāyogikam pañcam adhikaraṇam
